standard.description: These tests run against the DB objects and therefore may be hard to associate with a given application. They can be associated with the Application Standards Tracker app.

test.query_clob:
select  'N' pass_yn,
        object_name,
        object_type,
        0 line,
        apex_string.format('%0 is invalid', object_name) code,
         'INVALID OBJECT : '||owner||'.'||object_name unqid,
				 owner schema
from v_user_objects
where status != 'VALID'
test.fix: Make the object valid or drop the object
